de.hsrm.diogenes.connection
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  de.hsrm.diogenes.connection.Connection
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.fhwiesbaden.webrobbie.wrp.WRPPacketListener
public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.fhwiesbaden.webrobbie.wrp.WRPPacketListener

The Connection class establishes a new connection to the robot, adds itself as a packetlistener.

getLocation

public Location getLocation()
Returns the current robot's location values (x, y, angle). The location will be sent by the robot every 100ms (initialized when connecting) to the client and saved in the local member location.

Returns:
An Object with x and y coordinates and the angle of the robot within
